## p. 9 (#21) ###############################################

Social Register ,
Summer,
1910.
Vol. XXIV. No. 56.
JJNE, 1910
Contains the Summer Addresses of residents of
New York,
Cincinnati & Dayton,
Washington,
Cleveland,
Philadelphia,
St. Paul,
Chicago,
Minneapolis,
Boston,
San Francisco & Oakland,
Providence,
Baltimore,
St. Louis,
Buffalo,
Pittsburgh,
Southern Cities
$
SOCIAL , REGISTER . ASSOCIATION,
BOWLING GREEN, 29 BROADWAY, NEW YORK CITY.
Copyright 1910 by The Social REGISTER ASSOCIATION.


## p. 9 (#22) ###############################################

E124
7
26
1910
This Summer Social Register records the country or foreign
address of the prominent families of New York, Washington,
Philadelphia, Chicago, Boston, Providence, St. Louis, Pitts-
burgh, Cleveland, Cincinnati & Dayton (new this year), St.
Paul and Minneapolis, San Francisco & Oakland, Baltimore,
Buffalo and Southern Cities from Richmond to Atlanta, com-
bined in one volume. Each city, istinct by itself, arranged
in the above order.
ve
The winter issues for each y will appear in November,
with Duter, in December, January, February and April.
They will record the full names and addresses of members
of prominent families, grouped together, the clubs to which
they belong, and the marriage, death, and European arrival
and departure of each person as it may occur.
The names of Juniors 14 to 20
appear under the
names of the older members of their families.
The subscription is $5.00 per annum for each city.
A subscription of $30.00 will include all the issues for New
York, Washington, Philadelphia, Chicago, Boston, Provi-
dence, St. Louis, Pittsburgh, Cleveland, Cincinnati & Dayton
(new this year), St. Paul and Minneapolis, San Francisco &
Oakland, Baltimore and Southern Cities from Richmond to
Atlanta and the Locater.
The Locater, a separate book from the Social Register,
combines the names in all the Social Registers, indicates to
which city each name belongs and the family's head under
which it may be found. Price, $5.00.
Information for November should be received before Octo-
}
ber 15.


## p. 9 (#23) ###############################################

Familit's not appearing in this Summer issue will be
found at the address given in previous issues...
Dilatory under front cover of this book should be; con-
sulted first for all changes. If the name be not found there,
it is correct in the main book.
Sloop Yacht.
Schooner Yacht.
Steam Yacht or Launch.
Cr. Corinthian Yacht Club of Philadelphia.
Ey. Eastern Yacht Club of Boston.
Lc. Larchmont Yacht Club of New York.
Ny. New York Yacht Club.
S. Seawanhaka Corinthian Yacht Club of New York.
